title: ‘Every passing year is a prize for me’ :Amitabh Bachchan
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai,   For his 73rd birthday, megastar Amitabh Bachchan has chosen to skirt a fabulous festival. He needs to spend it simply like whatever other typical days with his crew. “ 
It will be much the same as whatever other ordinary day with the crew. Nothing uncommon,” a source was cited as saying in an IANS report. Thinking back on his life, Amitabh Bachchan says, “My present is by the finesse of the god-like so colossally occupied that I have little time to think back and evaluate. However, regardless of the possibility that I were to, what might I evaluate?” he said. “By and by I have my family, professionally I have a couple tasks which I take a shot at, and I invest energy with them in equivalent measure. Every passing year is a prize for me.” Related Posts
